mehidi marunu pudgalayan sirura widiwalata genawith muhuna yatata sitinase paradige adagenayama ha sirura ella kunu,mada wani dewalin gasima sidukarana ladi.[109][110] ithihasaye kristhiyani palliwala ayagen siyadiwi nasaganimata thathkala aya aagam sabhawen iwathkarana lada athara ohunge siruru parishuddhathathwayata pathkarana lada sohon bim walata eliyen mihidan karana ladi. [111]19wana siyawasedi eksath rajadhaniye siyadiwi nasaganimata wera darima ha minis ghathanayata thathkirima samana waradawal lesa salaku athara ella marima daduwam lesa labadena ladi.
